div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1892 Paestum (anc. Poseidonia), Lucania, 1952 Burial: c. 450 B.C. (K) Contents: 43 AR Poseidonia: 37 st.; 1 dr. (incuse) 1 st.; 3 diob. (double-relief) Sybaris: 1 triob. (Poseidon/bull) Disposition: Naples Pozzi, AIIN 1962-4, pp. 82-90, illus.
